channel.title: Wii ftw
channel.description:
first off A LATE MERRY CHRISTMAS. ok now to the nitty gridy.
for christms this year i got myself a wii, thank you santa.
thw wii is awsome with its great internet acsess and gamecube plugs. the motion sensor is a great feature. all this for only 250!!!!! i definatly think you should get one. later they will drop prices.
vote away

item.title: Wii ftw
item.dc:creator: @shadow_hearts shadow hearts
item.description:
@shadow_hearts wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:25, topic:40350”][quote author=PaulT link=topic=56527.msg701967#msg701967 date=1167373868]

plus you wont look like a pansy while playing it

As if somebody is going to sneak into my livingroom and hide behind my couch to make sure I don’t play videogames “Like a pussy.”
[/quote]

The only games I play are ones when my friends are around, we play fps games and sport games. We all agreed the wii sucks and is for little kids, but maybe other people out there think otherwise, but thats just imo.[/quote]

The wii owns, It’s simply because I dont think you ever played the Wii before, it’s a fun pleasure to kill a monster by stabbing it with your Wii remote.[br][size=1]Posted on: December 28, 2006, 07:52:59 PM[/size][hr]And the X-box 360 games are over priced, they have good games, but for 60$ it’s gotta be good for me to play it.

Read full topic

item.title: Wii ftw
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Obviously, Jme, you have never smacked somebody in the face with a videogame controller. It is a pleasure that cannot be described in words, typed or spoken. The idea that you can somehow earn points for this is exciting and new, unlike FPS and sports games, which are boring and old.

Read full topic

item.title: Wii ftw
item.dc:creator: @shadow_hearts shadow hearts
item.description:
@shadow_hearts wrote:

Wii ftw the games are good umm… really fun to play on good action games like redsteel! and also the games are cheaper then x box 360 (the games for x box are about 60 bucks) and the ps3 i dont know much about but it’s commercials are scary…

Read full topic

item.title: Wii ftw

item.description:
@wonderguy6 wrote:

Yz85Racer:

I can’t decide, I’ve only played a WII and an xbox 360, I have never even seen a PS3.

Holy shit man, wiis just came out (in auzzie)

item.title: Wii ftw
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

plus you wont look like a pansy while playing it

As if somebody is going to sneak into my livingroom and hide behind my couch to make sure I don’t play videogames “Like a pussy.”

I get points for hitting people with my controller, right? I mean if I buy the right game and swing the controller enough times, it should happen eventually. And that’s the important thing, that nintendo rewards gratuitous violence.

Read full topic

item.title: Wii ftw
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“juju, post:15, topic:40350”][quote author=Silver Lining link=topic=56527.msg700898#msg700898 date=1167362495]

I hate x-box, my brother bought it, i am a sony fanyboy, i just think the ps3 is junk, who cares if they are selling it cheaper, No real games, Wow blu-ray , what if you arent gonna use that?

it has 256mb of memory, while x-box 360 also has 512

X-box live is gonna be much better than the ps3 online…
[/quote]I assure you, Blu-ray disks are wonderful. They offer 50gb of storage, allowing for a much greater length game and many more character models. Ever thought of the possibility of getting the whole LOTR set of movies in one disk and also having all of the special features with it? It’s quite a wonderful thing, a blu-ray disk is.

What happens when BR loses the format wars, just like all the other data formats by Sony have failed rather miserably?

If I wanted something that has only got GFX power I’d rather buy a computer than a PS3/XBox. The Wii is revolutionary.[/quote]
The ps3 has the same motion technology as the wii, plus you wont look like a pansy while playing it. Not to mention an extremely higher amount of processing power and graphics, so really I dont see how the wii is any better, other then the price.

Read full topic

item.title: Wii ftw
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

PS3 is better than the 360 is so many ways. 360 fans, just fail to accept it.

A Ferrari is better than a Hyundai, but I’m never going to buy either, because I have feet.

Read full topic

item.title: Wii ftw
item.dc:creator: @DeadBird DeadBird
item.description:
@DeadBird wrote:

[quote=“I Really Did Lol, post:10, topic:40350”][quote author=frost21 link=topic=56527.msg700432#msg700432 date=1167356536]
I have and x-box 360 live, and am getting a wii tommorrow, ps3 is a joke,nothing is really special about it, overpriced junk , imo.

Wii isnt that cheap though, $280+Wiimote+2nunchucks = $280+tax and if you want high def,hd cabe = $450+
[/quote]

Firstly, I say to you, PS3 is better than Xbox in 9/10 ways. The only reason some people are against the PS3, is because Sony decided to buy an advertising program, that involved spyware. That’s the reason this ‘PS3 sux0rs’ has developed round the internet.

Another reason why people say the Xbox 360 is better, is because the Xbox was so much better than the PS2. The Xbox fanboys want the 360 to kick PS3s ass, which it cannot.

It costs Sony like 600 USD to make 1 unit. That’s 600 USD to make 1 PS3. Why aren’t they selling for 700 USD? Because they make the real money from the games! It’s like the PSP. It costs Sony something like 180 GBP per PSP, yet they sell cheaper, because they rake back the money lost with games sold.

PS3 is better than the 360 is so many ways. 360 fans, just fail to accept it.[/quote]
I suggest you research abit more. However, PS3 is good.
(Yes, I’m pro 360, but I’m not a fanboy.)

Read full topic

Another reason why people say the Xbox 360 is better, is because the Xbox was so much better than the PS2. The Xbox fanboys want the 360 to kick PS3s ass, which it cannot.

It costs Sony like 600 USD to make 1 unit. That’s 600 USD to make 1 PS3. Why aren’t they selling for 700 USD? Because they make the real money from the games! It’s like the PSP. It costs Sony something like 180 GBP per PSP, yet they sell cheaper, because they rake back the money lost with games sold.

PS3 is better than the 360 is so many ways. 360 fans, just fail to accept it.
